meanings.definition: Able to be used for multiple purposes.
meanings.sent1: The multiuse tool can be used for fixing things and opening bottles.
meanings.sent2: I bought a multiuse backpack that can hold my books and my water bottle.
meanings.sent3: The multiuse kitchen gadget made cooking dinner much easier.
meanings.sent4: Her multiuse skills in organization saved the day during the event.
meanings.sent5: The multiuse smartphone app helped me track my expenses and set reminders.

meanings.definition: Designed for or capable of serving many functions.
meanings.sent1: The multiuse furniture in the living room can be a sofa and a bed.
meanings.sent2: The multiuse printer can scan, copy, and print documents.
meanings.sent3: The multiuse pen has different colors for writing and highlighting.
meanings.sent4: His multiuse talent for playing multiple instruments impressed everyone.
meanings.sent5: The multiuse vehicle can transport goods and people efficiently.
